messages.subject: For Ned
messages.msgSnippet: Ned, Your words here are sooo up lifting. You just gave advise to a new unschooler about the elephant in the middle of the living room. Could you send that
messages.messageBody:
Ned,
Your words here are sooo up lifting.
You just gave advise to a new unschooler about the elephant in the middle of
the living room.
Could you send that email to me privately, as I want to print it off and
don't know how to do that on a long list of email letters...(Okay, so I am
not into attempting to figure it out either, sorry... easier to ask you..:-)

Let me know and thanks!
Bj4kids@...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
